remove_old.label: Remove Old Level Roles
remove_old.description: When a user gains a level, the bot will try to remove any known previous level roles

announce_level_up.label: Announce Level Up
announce_level_up.description: Announces that the user leveled up, in the channel where they leveled up from

xp_gain.label: Role XP Gain
xp_gain.description: Grant certain roles (or everyone) XP when they speak. Limits XP gains to once per minute
